verses.verse: And I <S%G3708>saw<s%> <S%G243>another<s%> <S%G2478>strong<s%> <S%G32>angel<s%> <S%G2597>coming<s%> <S%G2597>down<s%> out of <S%G3772>heaven,<s%> <S%G4016>clothed<s%> with a <S%G3507>cloud;<s%> and the <S%G2463>rainbow<s%> was upon his <S%G2776>head,<s%> and his <S%G4383>face<s%> was <S%G5613>like<s%> the <S%G2246>sun,<s%> and his <S%G4228>feet<s%> <S%G5613>like<s%> <S%G4769>pillars<s%> of <S%G4442>fire;<s%>

and he <S%G2192>had<s%> in his <S%G5495>hand<s%> a <S%G974>little<s%> <S%G974>book<s%> which was <S%G455>open.<s%> And he <S%G5087>placed<s%> his <S%G1188>right<s%> <S%G4228>foot<s%> on the <S%G2281>sea<s%> and his <S%G2176>left<s%> on the <S%G1093>land;<s%>

and he <S%G2896>cried<s%> out with a <S%G3173>loud<s%> <S%G5456>voice,<s%> as when a <S%G3023>lion<s%> <S%G3455>roars;<s%> and <S%G3753>when<s%> he had <S%G2896>cried<s%> out, the <S%G2033>seven<s%> <S%G1027>peals<s%> of <S%G1027>thunder<s%> <S%G2980>uttered<s%> their <S%G5456>voices.<s%>

And <S%G3753>when<s%> the <S%G2033>seven<s%> <S%G1027>peals<s%> of <S%G1027>thunder<s%> had <S%G2980>spoken,<s%> I was <S%G3195>about<s%> to <S%G1125>write;<s%> and I <S%G191>heard<s%> a <S%G5456>voice<s%> from <S%G3772>heaven<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G4972>"Seal<s%> up the things <S%G3739>which<s%> the <S%G2033>seven<s%> <S%G1027>peals<s%> of <S%G1027>thunder<s%> have <S%G2980>spoken,<s%> and do not <S%G1125>write<s%> them."

And the <S%G32>angel<s%> <S%G3739>whom<s%> I <S%G3708>saw<s%> <S%G2476>standing<s%> on the <S%G2281>sea<s%> and on the <S%G1093>land<s%> <S%G142>lifted<s%> up his <S%G1188>right<s%> <S%G5495>hand<s%> to <S%G3772>heaven,<s%>

and <S%G3660>swore<s%> by Him who <S%G2198>lives<s%> <S%G165>forever<s%> and <S%G165>ever,<s%> <S%G3739>who<s%> <S%G2936>created<s%> <S%G3772>heaven<s%> and the things in it, and the <S%G1093>earth<s%> and the things in it, and the <S%G2281>sea<s%> and the things in it, that there shall be <S%G5550>delay<s%> <S%G3765>no<s%> <S%G3765>longer,<s%>

but in the <S%G2250>days<s%> of the <S%G5456>voice<s%> of the <S%G1442>seventh<s%> <S%G32>angel,<s%> <S%G3752>when<s%> he is <S%G3195>about<s%> to <S%G4537>sound,<s%> <S%G2532>then<s%> the <S%G3466>mystery<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> is <S%G5055>finished,<s%> as He <S%G2097>preached<s%> to His <S%G1401>servants<s%> the <S%G4396>prophets.<s%>

And the <S%G5456>voice<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> I <S%G191>heard<s%> from <S%G3772>heaven,<s%> [I heard] <S%G3825>again<s%> <S%G2980>speaking<s%> with me, and <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G5217>"Go,<s%> <S%G2983>take<s%> the <S%G975>book<s%> which is <S%G455>open<s%> in the <S%G5495>hand<s%> of the <S%G32>angel<s%> who <S%G2476>stands<s%> on the <S%G2281>sea<s%> and on the <S%G1093>land.<s%>"

And I <S%G565>went<s%> to the <S%G32>angel,<s%> <S%G3004>telling<s%> him to <S%G1325>give<s%> me the <S%G974>little<s%> <S%G974>book.<s%> And he <S%G3004>said<s%> to me, <S%G2983>"Take<s%> it, and <S%G2719>eat<s%> it; and it will <S%G4087>make<s%> your <S%G2836>stomach<s%> <S%G4087>bitter,<s%> but in your <S%G4750>mouth<s%> it will be <S%G1099>sweet<s%> as <S%G3192>honey.<s%>"

And I <S%G2983>took<s%> the <S%G974>little<s%> <S%G974>book<s%> out of the angel's <S%G5495>hand<s%> and <S%G2719>ate<s%> it, and it was in my <S%G4750>mouth<s%> <S%G1099>sweet<s%> as <S%G3192>honey;<s%> and <S%G3753>when<s%> I had <S%G2068>eaten<s%> it, my <S%G2836>stomach<s%> was <S%G4087>made<s%> <S%G4087>bitter.<s%>

And they <S%G3004>said<s%> to me, "You <S%G1163>must<s%> <S%G4395>prophesy<s%> <S%G3825>again<s%> <S%G1909>concerning<s%> <S%G4183>many<s%> <S%G2992>peoples<s%> and <S%G1484>nations<s%> and <S%G1100>tongues<s%> and <S%G935>kings.<s%>"
